content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide a personal opinion, but I can tell you that the athleisure trend has been growing in popularity over the past few years and is expected to continue. The trend is driven by a shift towards more casual and comfortable clothing, as well as a growing appreciation for activewear's performance and versatility. Additionally, the pandemic has increased demand for comfortable and functional clothing suitable for both exercise and daily wear, especially as many people are working from home. Given these factors, it is likely that the athleisure trend will continue to grow in the near future.
